thread.section_title: Avis marchands de Euroflorist Belgique / België | Avis - Euroflorist Belgique / België | www.euroflorist.be
thread.title: John Thirion
thread.title_full: Euroflorist Belgique / België évalué par John Thirion

author: John Thirion
title: John Thirion
text: We received some sad news a week ago. Our dearest friends lost there daughter after a long fight with cancer. We live in the US and we wanted a bouquet to help us express our feelings and convey our sympothy. We reviewed the website and found a gorgeous arrangement so we ordered it. Tonight we received a photo of the bouquet from the parents, and it was more beautiful than the website photo... Thank you so much and we would highly recommend and trust your website with our oversea orders in the future
